_.name: Mundipagg_Payment_Module
_.summary: MundiPagg payment gateway integration extension / Integração com o gateway de pagamentos MundiPagg.
_.description:
MundiPagg Payment Gateway
IMPORTANT Always install our extension in your development environment before going live. We do not take any responsibility and we are not liable for any damage caused through use of products or services.
IMPORTANTE Em qualquer procedimento de instalação ou update existem riscos, aconselhamos sempre criar backups de sua loja e efetuar qualquer procedimento em ambiente de desenvolvimento antes, nunca diretamente em produção. Não nos responsabilizamos por eventuais incidentes causados por negligenciar este alerta ou por uso de produtos ou serviços de terceiros.
_.notes: -Change module routes -Fix configurable product -Fixes Multibuyer with boleto + credit cards -Added Multicurrency support. -Add CI with CircleCI and Rancher -Implement Multibuyer frontend -Improve module logging. -Fixed multipayment value input balance weird behavior -Fix amex doesn't transactioning -Mundipagg brand update -Fix module break on saved card checkout -Create multi buyer payment -Choose enabled brands when default installments option is enabled -Remove credit card data from backend -Remove null coalesce operator -Module i18n -Value balance on multipayment -Closes mundipagg/plug-team#127 -Fix config title not showed on checkout -Closes mundipagg/plug-team#129. -Boleto link on checkout success -Closes mundipagg/plug-team#128. -Saved Credit cards wallet and javascript adjusts. -Closes mundipagg/plug-team#74 -closes mundipagg/plug-team#76 -Fix GitHub templates -#76 Fix config.xml. -#76 create install script -Add module package xml guide. -Merge develop into master -Refatorar backend -Mod 284 remover codigo desnecessario -Frontend Architectural changes -Backend architectural changes -Implement Boleto + Creditcard payment Method -Validation and bug fixes. -Implements the backend functionalities of Boleto + CC Payment Method - Implements the frontend functionalities of Boleto + CC Payment Method -Merge Develop into Master -Deal with order response -Add a Codacy badge to README.md -Deal with API response -Deal with all webhooks -Deal with order canceled -Deal with order paid - Deal with refunded, partialRefunded and partialCanceled -Deal with charge paid, overpaid and underpaid -Deal with charge created. -Feature/mod 231 add api to respond to weebhook -Feature/mod 234 add antifraude -Add installments and interest to Order -Add Shipping info in order request -Handle Order/Charge statuses changes. -Log order request and response -Show installments by creditcard brand -Get creditcard bin and show brand image -Fix state code -Validate checkout fields -Add phpcs and phpcs to composer scripts section -Add credit card payment to the module -Get Token -Add credit card form -Add js to checkout screen -Update sdk source -Create credit card transaction -Feature/show mundipagg payment -Add namespace and fix menus -add sdk to project -Feature/insert icons -Feature/mod 92 create config screens -Create module -Update README. -
